Bash(python3 -c "
import re
with open\(''/data/data/com.termux/files/home/.config/tmux/git.sh'', ''r''\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)
    # Find lines with icon definitions
    matches = re.findall\(r""''\(@tmux2k[^'']+\)'' ''\([^'']+\)''"", content\)
    for name, icon in matches:
        print\(f''{name}: {icon}''\)
")
